basics.name: Jacob Isaacson
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Results driven leader with experience in private equity, real estate, hospitality and managment seeking a software enginnering role to leverage key new strengths.

work.summary: General Assembly's Software Engineer Immersive Student with 500+ hours of in-class learning complmented with research and sel-taught skills.  Worked on a toal of 5 projects, 4 of them full-stack applications and 1 pair-programmed.
highlights: Built several web apps using JavaScript, React, Python, Flask, SQL, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, HTML, and CSS.
Learned both the frontend and backend and how to make them communicate.
Grew as a software engineer, and realized how much I love coding!

work.summary: Add features and fix bugs for Recovery Brands network of websites.
highlights: Built "Recovery Brands" Sass framework, its automated build process, and documentation.
Implemented structured data markup across multiple websites of "Recovery Brands" network, which led to a 5% increase in CTR.
Consistently took part in adding new features for a network of 20+ WordPress websites (such as Rehabs.com) with a total amount of 5m+ visitors per month.
Ran workshops and talks on CSS & Sass architecture for the team of 5 frontend developers.

work.summary: Sass architecture and development of Udacity Blitz React app.
highlights: Frontend Sass development with the focus on reusability and cross-browser compatibility.
Implemented the Udacity Blitz UI kit using Sass.

education.institution: The Russian Presidential Academy of National Economy and Public Administration (RANEPA)
